item.description:
What's up incubators...

If you have a free Wednesday night, come check out my new improv group Eight to the Table perform at Improv Boston as part of The Hump show. It's $10 or $7 for students.

I promise it will be unlike any improv show you've seen before. We are more focused on movement and less on dialogue and very much action theater. Bring your eyes and your ears and a smile.

Hope to see some of you there!!

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in all black. And not playing rugby.
item.name: Eight to the Table, my new improv group perfroms again this Wednesday night 8pm
